amendment.description: To provide for rehabilitation of certain dams.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5063 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5063 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5742-5743) To provide for rehabilitation of certain dams.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5063 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 4979.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5063 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
